Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Cicero
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Cicero, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Cicero, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Washington. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Washington.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
